title.rendered: Ariana Afghan Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Ariana Afghan Airlines (ARIANA) is the largest airline in Afghanistan and serves as the country’s National Carrier. Founded in 1955, ARIANA is the oldest airline of Afghanistan and has historical credibility in the aviation market. The company has its main base at Kabul International Airport, from where it provides flights to India, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, Kuwait and UAE. The carrier is headquartered in Char Rahi Shaheed, Shahr-e-Naw, Kabul.

Verified & Updated 21/09/20

Address :
Char-Rahi Shaheed, Shahr-e-Naw
P.O. Box # 76, Kabul, Afghanistan

Phone : +93 (0) 777-071333
+93 (0) 700-071333
+93 (0) 790-071333
+93 (0) 786-071333

Email id : info@flyariana.com
sales@flyariana.com
ticketing@flyariana.com
kabul@flyariana.com

Fax :

Ariana Afghan Airlines Official website :https://www.flyariana.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Ariana Afghan Airlines 

  • Airbus A310-300
  • Boeing 737-400
  • Boeing 737-500

Ariana Afghan Airlines Baggage Allowance

Ariana Afghan Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Ariana Afghan Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Ariana Afghan Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Ariana Afghan Airlines  Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Ariana Afghan Airlines: (click on the stars below)
